text: (Isrāyīliṉ cantatikaḷē!) Uṅkaḷukku mikak koṭiya tuṉpaṅkaḷai viḷaivittuk koṇṭirunta ḥpir'avṉuṭaiya kūṭṭattāriṭamiruntu nām uṅkaḷai pātukāttuk koṇṭatai nīṅkaḷ niṉaittup pāruṅkaḷ. Avarkaḷ uṅkaḷ āṇ piḷḷaikaḷaik kolai ceytuviṭṭu uṅkaḷ peṇ piḷḷaikaḷai (maṭṭum) uyiruṭaṉ vāḻaviṭṭu vantārkaḷ. Itil uṅkaḷukku uṅkaḷ iṟaivaṉāl periyatoru cōtaṉai ēṟpaṭṭiruntatu
